abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ { "or" : [ "BasisOfRecord is Human Observation", "BasisOfRecord is Machine Observation" ] }, "Country is Norway", "HasCoordinate is true", "HasGeospatialIssue is false", "TaxonKey is Lyrurus tetrix (Linnaeus, 1758)", "Year 1899-2021" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Bird observations at Vikevatnet Norway 2 records from Jordal 7 records from Tetraonid line transect surveys from Norway: Data from Finnmarkseiendommen (FeFo) 9 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 12 records from naturgucker 33 records from Xeno-canto - Bird sounds from around the world 41 records from Birds ringed with Norwegian rings 1914-1960 49 records from BioFokus 130 records from GalliForm: Galliformes occurrence records from the Indo-Malay and Palaearctic, 1800-2008 136 records from Birds ringed with Norwegian rings 1961-1990 147 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 383 records from EOD â€“ eBird Observation Dataset 945 records from TOV-E Bird monitoring sampling data 1165 records from Tetraonid line transect surveys from Norway: Data from Fjellstyrene 1710 records from Tetraonid line transect surveys from Norway: Data from Statskog 4193 records from Norwegian Biodiversity Information Centre - Other datasets 30162 records from Norwegian Species Observation Service
